name: Folia de Reis (Revelry of Kings)
description: Revelry of Kings is a Brazilian folkloric manifestation, it celebrates the arrival of the three kings on Christmas Eve. Music, theater and processions taking over the streets and alleys of inland cities ... In this piece we see the musicians, the kings and the clowns, in charge of cheering the neighborhood with acrobatics and jokes, collecting money for charity and for next year's party. On soundtrack, Elton Amorim on accordion and Gomesu on Hillbilly Viola.
